hero.title: View & Download Telegram Stories
hero.description: Telestory lets you watch and save Telegram stories. Access any user's stories, save them for later, and share with friends - all without revealing your identity.

features.title: Powerful Features for Story Viewing
features.subtitle: Everything you need to view, save, and share Telegram stories without anyone knowing.

saveStories.title: Save Stories
saveStories.description: Download and save both your own stories and others' stories to your device for later viewing.

anonymousViewing.title: Anonymous Viewing
anonymousViewing.description: Watch any Telegram user's stories completely anonymously without them knowing you viewed it.

shareWithFriends.title: Share with Friends
shareWithFriends.description: Easily share any story with your friends and family through various platforms.

completePrivacy.title: Complete Privacy
completePrivacy.description: Your identity remains completely hidden. View stories without leaving any traces.

anyUserAccess.title: Any User Access
anyUserAccess.description: Access stories from any Telegram user, whether they're in your contacts or not.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Available as both a Telegram bot and mobile app for iOS and Android.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start for free or upgrade to premium for unlimited access and advanced features.

download.title: Get Started Today
download.subtitle: Choose your preferred way to access Telestory - through our Telegram bot or mobile app.

cta.title: Ready to View and Save Stories?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who are already using Telestory to view and save Telegram stories privately.
